content: The GOP had almost eight years to create a replacement for the A.C.A. — the fallout they’re experiencing is the fruit of their not very hard earned labors. Seriously, after eight years, Trumpcare was the Republicans’ best answer to repeal and replace the A.C.A.? This situation reminds me of this apropos quote, courtesy of Benjamin Franklin: “Any fool can criticize, condemn and complain and most fools do.” After eight years in opposition condemning the A.C.A., the fools have been exposed.
